title: Erik Spoelstra says team has come together
text: Erik Spoelstra says team has come together OCT 24, 10:47 pm Miami Heat coach Erik Spoelstra says the team has come together during training camp and everyone is ready for the start of the season. 10 matchups to watch during NFL Week 7 0 Comments You may use your Facebook account to add a comment on FoxSports.com , subject to Facebook's Terms of Use and Privacy Policy .
